description:
Devin is a 20-year-old straight guy.
"You have a really exotic look," I told him when I first met him.
"Yeah, my grandparents were from the Philippines," he said. "And the rest of my family is pretty much German."
In and out of relationships, Devin told me that he doesn't get sex as often as he'd like.
"How often would you like it?" I asked.
"Two or three times a day," he said.
"Yeah, you'd really have to have a steady girlfriend for that," I joked. "Do you have one now?"
"No," he said, smiling.
After the introductions, I had him get undressed. He's got a nice, dark, healthy bush and a big mushroom head on his cock. And a little hair on his ass, but not much more.
title: Devin
